inclusion.criterion: Medical diagnosis of chronic cervical pain (more than 3 months of cervical pain evolution)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Recent spine, head or mouth surgery.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Recent infection and/or inflammatory arthritis, and cervical and/or brain traumatism records.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Contraindication for manual therapy or cervical training
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 15-year-old boy with asthma diagnosed a year ago. He presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough.
